title: Fox and the jug
creator_credit: Official Films, Czechoslovak State Film and St Latal
brief_description: An animated version of the fable. A sly fox is looking for an easy dinner. An innocent looking jug upsets his plans and the little red rooster lives to run another day.
creator_credit_for_label: Official Films, Czechoslovak State Film and St Latal
